name: TerraCota
description: TerraCota is a local two-player turn-based strategy game played on a grid where the goal is for a player to get to the other side first. There´s a time limit before the game ends. And the cards which are collected on your journey and how you use them play a big role in who the winner turns out to be. There are three sizes of boards. The music and pixel-art helps create the vibes to make this a calm and smooth strategy gaming experience. Please leave a comment on whatever you felt about the game if you download it.
